title: Pickup Lines
alt: That shirt looks good on you, but it would look even better stuffed onto the neck of a vodka bottle and flung burning through our office building's window. Let's fucking do it and never look back.
transcript:
[Cueball at a bar.]
Cueball: If I could rearrange the alphabet, I'd put your sister and I together.
Cueball: Is your father a thief? Because that's totally my Jetta you parked outside.
Cueball: You must be tired, 'cause you've been running through my mind all night.
Cueball: Screaming.
